text: George Parker Bidder Jr. (1836 - 1896) was a British barrister who represented many water companies against the London County Council. His father was George Parker Bidder. There is a memorial to him on Mitcham Common. Category:Queen's Counsel 1801–1900 Category:Burials at Kensal Green Cemetery Category:1896 deaths Category:1836 births
title: George Parker Bidder Jr.
